intro:
Spot the sneaky cats hidden across beautiful Japan!
Relax, explore, and test your sharp eyes.
Can you find them all?
description:
Find the Cats: Japan Journey
Pack your bags and get ready for a relaxing yet challenging adventure through the beautiful sights of Japan – and the most adorable scavenger hunt you’ve ever played!
From bustling Tokyo streets to tranquil Kyoto gardens, your mission is simple… or so it seems: find all the hidden cats cleverly tucked away in each detailed scene. Some are easy to spot, while others are masters of disguise!
Features:
Search for dozens of hidden cats in charming Japanese-themed levels
Explore stunning hand-drawn locations from cities to temples and countryside
Relaxed gameplay perfect for all ages – play at your own pace
Zoom and pan to uncover every sneaky feline
Unlock new scenes and challenges as you progress
Enjoy the cozy soundtrack and calming atmosphere

Whether you’re a casual player looking for something soothing or a puzzle lover seeking the ultimate hidden object challenge, Find the Cats: Japan Journey will keep you purring with joy.

Can you find them all?
